books.author: by Brit Bennett
books.description: The lives of twin sisters who run away from a Southern Black community at age 16 diverge as one returns and the other takes on a different racial identity but their fates intertwine.
books.name: THE VANISHING HALF

books.author: by Elin Hilderbrand
books.description: A relationship that started in 1993 between Mallory Blessing and Jake McCloud comes to light while she is on her deathbed and his wife runs for president.
books.name: 28 SUMMERS

books.author: by Christine Feehan
books.description: The fourth book in the Torpedo Ink series. A biker wants to know what a local librarian is hiding.
books.name: DESOLATION ROAD

books.author: by Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING

books.author: by Lucy Foley
books.description: A wedding between a TV star and a magazine publisher on an island off the coast of Ireland turns deadly.
books.name: THE GUEST LIST

books.author: by Hank Green
books.description: Mysterious books hint at what caused the untimely demise of April May and the sudden disappearance of robots known as the Carls.
books.name: A BEAUTIFULLY FOOLISH ENDEAVOR

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: Cullen Post, a lawyer and Episcopal minister, antagonizes some ruthless killers when he takes on a wrongful conviction case.
books.name: THE GUARDIANS

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: The line between fact and fiction becomes blurred when an author of thrillers is found dead after a hurricane hits Camino Island.
books.name: CAMINO WINDS

books.author: by Celeste Ng
books.description: An artist upends a quiet town outside Cleveland.
books.name: LITTLE FIRES EVERYWHERE

books.author: by Kevin Kwan
books.description: A nod to “A Room With a View” in which Lucie Tang Churchill is torn between her WASPy billionaire fiancé and a privileged hunk born in Hong Kong.
books.name: SEX AND VANITY

books.author: by Jeanine Cummins
books.description: A bookseller flees Mexico for the United States with her son while pursued by the head of a drug cartel.
books.name: AMERICAN DIRT

books.author: by Linda Castillo
books.description: The 12th book in the Kate Burkholder series. A cop goes into hiding on an Amish widower’s farm while a killer lies in wait.
books.name: OUTSIDER

books.author: by James Patterson and Brendan DuBois
books.description: Jeremiah Cook, a veteran and former N.Y.P.D. cop, investigates a mass murder near a lake in Georgia.
books.name: THE SUMMER HOUSE

books.author: by Lisa Jewell
books.description: Ten years after her daughter disappears, a woman tries to get her life in order but remains haunted by unanswered questions.
books.name: THEN SHE WAS GONE

books.author: by Susan Wiggs
books.description: Natalie Harper takes over the care of her mother’s bookshop and her ailing grandfather.
books.name: THE LOST AND FOUND BOOKSHOP
